meanings.definition: A grill used for cooking food over an open flame.
meanings.sent1: The restaurant's charbroiler sizzled as it cooked the juicy burgers.
meanings.sent2: The chef placed the marinated chicken on the charbroiler to get those perfect grill marks.
meanings.sent3: The charbroiler and the flames danced together, creating a delicious symphony of flavors.
meanings.sent4: The charbroiler was a fiery beast, taming the raw meat into savory perfection.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the charbroiler filled the kitchen, enticing hungry customers.

meanings.definition: To cook food on a charbroiler.
meanings.sent1: She charbroiled the steaks to perfection for the family barbecue.
meanings.sent2: The chef charbroils the vegetables quickly to retain their natural flavors.
meanings.sent3: As the flames charbroiled the meat, the delicious smell wafted through the air.
meanings.sent4: The heat of the charbroiler seared the steak, locking in all the juices.
meanings.sent5: Charbroiling the fish gave it a smoky taste that everyone loved.
